com.github.nateowami.solve4x.solver

Class Step

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.nateowami.solve4x.solver.Step

  • public class Step
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a single step in solving or simplifying an equation or expression. Each step tracks difficulty, explanation, and an equation.
    Author:
    Nateowami
